projects.name: Galaxy Browser
projects.description: This website is an interface to an astronomy database of nearby galaxies, using a MongoDB database running on an Amazon EC2 server.

projects.name: iPad Controller
projects.description: This is a touch-screen controller for use on an iPad, using the NexusUI Javascript library. It features a step sequencer and adjustable presets to communicate with visual performance software via OSC.

projects.name: Sketch Pad
projects.description: This is a multi-user sketch pad program that was developed as a prototype for a local graffiti art festival. It uses NodeJS and the HTML5 Canvas object to let multiple users draw on the screen.

projects.name: Online Portfolio
projects.description: This portfolio website uses the Foundation framework and AngularJS, along with local JSON objects to store data.

projects.name: GoStickman Studios
projects.description: GoStickman creates animated explainer videos for online advertising and corporate presentations. I am the co-founder and lead producer/animator of all videos, as well as the creator of the website and marketing material.

projects.name: Sigma-1 Environments
projects.description: Sigma-1 is a studio that designs and deploys lighting and visuals for stages, special events and installations. I build lighting and video control software with TouchDesigner, and I perform as a video/visual artist.

projects.name: Multiverse
projects.description: Multiverse is a galactic astronomy map and creative visualization program I created with TouchDesigner software and Python scripts. The project was covered in an August 2014 story in the Globe and Mail newspaper.
